patch:
@@ -33,9 +33,14 @@ dependencies {
     implementation 'androidx.appcompat:appcompat:1.2.0'
     implementation 'com.google.android.material:material:1.2.1'
     implementation 'androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout:2.0.4'
+    implementation platform('com.google.firebase:firebase-bom:26.6.0')
     implementation 'androidx.legacy:legacy-support-v4:1.0.0'
     implementation 'androidx.coordinatorlayout:coordinatorlayout:1.1.0'
+    implementation 'com.google.firebase:firebase-firestore:21.4.0'
     testImplementation 'junit:junit:4.+'
     androidTestImplementation 'androidx.test.ext:junit:1.1.2'
     androidTestImplementation 'androidx.test.espresso:espresso-core:3.3.0'
-}
\ No newline at end of file
+}
+
+apply plugin: 'com.android.application'
+apply plugin: 'com.google.gms.google-services'
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -2,6 +2,8 @@
 <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
     package="ru.android1.mycoolnotes">
 
+    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
+
     <application
         android:allowBackup="true"
         android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"

@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@
     tools:showIn="@layout/app_bar_main">
 
 
-    <fragment android:name="ru.android1.mycoolnotes.NotesFragment"
+    <fragment android:name="ru.android1.mycoolnotes.notes.NotesFragment"
         android:id="@+id/cities"
         android:layout_weight="1"
         android:layout_width="0px"

@@ -4,9 +4,10 @@
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
     android:orientation="vertical"
-    tools:context=".NoteDescriptionFragment">
+    tools:context=".note_description.NoteDescriptionFragment">
 
     <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
+        android:id="@+id/update_button"
         android:layout_width="wrap_content"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
         android:text="@string/save_note_button"

@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
     xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
-    tools:context=".NotesFragment">
+    tools:context=".notes.NotesFragment">
 
     <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
         android:id="@+id/recycler_view_lines"

@@ -1,29 +1,29 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
     xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
-    android:id="@+id/textView"
+    android:id="@+id/CardView"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
     app:cardCornerRadius="15dp"
     app:cardElevation="3dp">
 
     <LinearLayout
-        android:id="@+id/note_review"
+        android:id="@+id/linL_item_note_review"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="match_parent"
         android:background="@color/cardview_light_background"
         android:orientation="vertical">
 
         <TextView
-            android:id="@+id/name"
+            android:id="@+id/tv_item_note_name"
             android:layout_width="match_parent"
             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:text="@string/note_name"
             android:textSize="35sp"
             android:textColor="@color/purple_500" />
 
         <TextView
-            android:id="@+id/date"
+            android:id="@+id/tv_item_note_date"
             android:layout_width="match_parent"
             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:text="@string/data"

@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+
+    <item
+        android:id="@+id/action_delete"
+        android:orderInCategory="20"
+        android:title="@string/delete_popup"/>
+
+</menu>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -16,4 +16,9 @@
     <string name="item">item</string>
     <string name="note_name">note name</string>
     <string name="data">data</string>
+    <string name="delete_popup">Удалить</string>
+    <string name="note_fragment_alert_title">Предупреждение</string>
+    <string name="note_fragment_alert_message">Точно хочешь удалить?</string>
+    <string name="note_fragment_alert_button_positive">Удалить</string>
+    <string name="note_fragment_alert_button_negative">Нет</string>
 </resources>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -13,4 +13,14 @@
         <item name="android:statusBarColor" tools:targetApi="l">?attr/colorPrimaryVariant</item>
         <!-- Customize your theme here. -->
     </style>
+
+    <style name="Theme.MyCoolNotes.NoActionBar">
+        <item name="windowActionBar">false</item>
+        <item name="windowNoTitle">true</item>
+    </style>
+
+    <style name="Theme.MyCoolNotes.AppBarOverlay" parent="ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar" />
+
+    <style name="Theme.MyCoolNotes.PopupOverlay" parent="ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light" />
+
 </resources>
